Text:
Very important about Joe's Adventures Installation:
1:Install  Mafia II Update 4 http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6636788
2: Install Joe's Adventures. 
Mafia II Update 4 - SKIDROW

1. Unpack the included rar files.
2. Run Mafia.II.Update.4.exe and install
3. Copy the cracked content from SKIDROW directory to your main installation directory and overwrite.

Joe's Adventures (DLC) - SKIDROW
Installation:
1. Unpack the included rar files.
2. Run Mafia.II.Update.4.exe and install
3. Copy the cracked content from SKIDROW directory to your main installation directory and overwrite.
4. Play the game

Tutorial How to Install Mafia II DLC Joe's Adventures + Mafia II + Jimmys Vendetta
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6638411/Tutorial_Install_Mafia_II_DLC_Joe____s_Adventures___Mafia_II
Additional Notes!! Before Run Mafia II launcher! Tic inactivate visual theme in all Mafia II launcher and the game runs much better..
